column1: **ASSOCIATED PRESS: "Some young children have forgotten how to eat with a knife and fork and others have regressed back into diapers as the coronavirus pandemic and related school closures take a toll on young peoples’ learning."**

THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS!!!! Prosecution barrister Michael Brady QC told the jury that the Crown Prosecution Service would no longer pursue a murder charge and asked them to find Skana not guilty of that offence. This woman murdered a little girl in broad daylight in a park on Mother’s Day. Eltiona Skana admitted she “picked her victim” (premeditation) then grabbed little Emily and slashed at her neck with a craft knife killing her. The decision to drop the charge had come following evidence from Dr Saifullah Syed Afghan - a consultant forensic psychiatrist who is treating Skana at Rampton Hospital. Absolutely outrageous!!!
There was a knife attack in Austria! Don’t ask where it happened what religion the murderer is or what he yelled as he stabbed the Jews.

Doc Rivers appears to be a nice man. His emotions here are palpable. Problem is -- he has it very wrong on #JacobBlake. Blake was accused of rape had a felony warrant and fought with police on the ground while possessing a knife. Watching 5 seconds of him walking around his car is what Rivers is going by. And that's dangerously ignorant of the facts. And there's way more to the #BreonnaTaylor case. Check out the Tatum Report for that. As far as comparing Michigan protesters to those rioting and looting -- in Michigan they went to the government to have their protests heard. They're not burning down businesses nor looting the Target. These false equivalencies are killing our nation.

A home invader who resisted arrest. A sex predator armed with a knife. A drug dealer whose boyfriend shot first at the cops. These are the BEST cases the #BLM Left can produce of “innocent” victims of police shooting. What this implies is that truly innocent cases do not exist!

The four scumbags couldn’t put him down or get the better of him in the fight so one of them decided to knife him in the stomach. Jack died later on that night from blood loss. This is the state of the UK today. I feel for his family and his friends losing a loved one to the very worst of our society. Rest in peace Jack
